sys_script.name: Map Data to Resource Unit

sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_323515_account_0_ru_task</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_323515_account_0_ru_task">state=3^EQ<item display_value="Closed Complete" endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="3"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Map Data to Resource Unit</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	var gd =new GlideDate();
var month = gd.getMonthNoTZ();
var gr =new GlideRecord('x_323515_account_0_resource_unit');
gr.addQuery('u_reference_unit_name', current.resource_unit_number);
gr.query();
if(gr.next()){

if(month == 1){
	gr.m1_results = current.current_month_count;
}
else if(month == 2){
	gr.m1_results = current.current_month_count;
}
else if(month == 3){
	gr.m1_results = current.current_month_count;
}
else if(month == 4){
	gr.m4_results = current.current_month_count;
}
else if(month == 5){
	gr.m5_results = current.current_month_count;
}
else if(month == 6){
	gr.m6_results = current.current_month_count;
}
else if(month == 7){
	gr.m7_results = current.current_month_count;
}
else if(month == 8){
	gr.m8_results = current.current_month_count;
}
else if(month == 9){
	gr.m9_results = current.current_month_count;
}
else if(month == 10){
	gr.m10_results = current.current_month_count;
}
else if(month == 11){
	gr.m11_results = current.current_month_count;
}
else if(month == 12){
	gr.m12_results = current.current_month_count;
}
	current.update();
}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-09-27 09:17:41</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>db4283dd97e17110e25972d6f053afba</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Map Data to Resource Unit</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Account Financials" source="x_323515_account_0">571aa98d975c3110e25972d6f053af59</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Account Financials">571aa98d975c3110e25972d6f053af59</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_db4283dd97e17110e25972d6f053afba</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-09-27 10:34:57</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=db4283dd97e17110e25972d6f053afba"/></record_update>
